text: 52 AM / in 7 minutes BRIEF-Sky Independent Committee Withdraws Recommendation For Fox Offer Reuters Staff April 25 (Reuters) - Sky Plc: * RESPONSE TO ALL-CASH OFFER BY COMCAST * RESPONSE TO ALL-CASH OFFER FOR SKY BY COMCAST CORPORATION * SKY ALSO INTENDS TO GIVE SAME POST-OFFER UNDERTAKINGS CONDITIONAL UPON COMCAST OFFER BECOMING WHOLLY UNCONDITIONAL * SKY SHAREHOLDERS ARE ADVISED TO TAKE NO ACTION * AS A RESULT OF ANNOUNCEMENT OF HIGHER CASH OFFER, INDEPENDENT COMMITTEE WITHDRAWING RECOMMENDATION OF OFFER ANNOUNCED BY 21CF ON DEC 15 2016 * CERTAIN PROVISIONS OF CO-OPERATION AGREEMENT WILL CEASE TO APPLY INCLUDING OBLIGATION ON 21CF TO PAY A BREAK FEE OF Â£200 MILLION * INDEPENDENT COMMITTEE IS NOW TERMINATING CO-OPERATION AGREEMENT ENTERED INTO WITH 21CF ON 15 DEC 2016 * INDEPENDENT COMMITTEE INTENDS TO CO-OPERATE FULLY WITH BOTH PARTIES TO SECURE RELEVANT APPROVALS IN ORDER TO SATISFY PRE- CONDITIONS FOR OFFERS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
